Literature.Title: Development of a novel hybrid antimicrobial peptide for enhancing antimicrobial spectrum and potency against food-borne pathogens.
Literature.Author: Han J, Wu P, Yang J, Weng Y,  Lin Y, Chen Z, Yu F, Lü X, Ni L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC90=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC90=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7 CICC 21530(MIC90=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC90=>128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=>256µg/ml)
